RaggedMatrix< Data > Class Template Reference
Matrix Containers

Detailed Description

template<typename Data>
class Util::RaggedMatrix< Data >

A 2D array in which different rows can have different lengths.

A RaggedMatrix object A is a two-dimensional array in which the operator A(i,j) returns a reference to element j of row i.

The memory for a RaggedMatrix is stored in a one-dimensional C array.

Definition at line 27 of file RaggedMatrix.h.
